div.p: My grandson recently enrolled in Horizon Science Academy under stressful circumstances. He was required to leave his former school suddenly and enroll in another school within a matter of days. Administration and staff made this transition a smooth and pleasant one. My grandson is happy at Horizon, has made new friends, and finds all the teachers to be friendly and helpful.
